title: How to Make Original Finger Gelatin (Knox Blox)

steps.title: Boil water in a pot on a stove.
steps.content: Boil water in a pot on a stove. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Mix in your gelatin packets.
steps.content: Mix in your gelatin packets. Packets may be of any taste you want, as long as they are all the same.

steps.title: Add in the Knox Gelatine.
steps.content: Add in the Knox Gelatine. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Stir completely until the mixture is fully dissolved.
steps.content: Stir completely until the mixture is fully dissolved. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Pour into a pan.
steps.content: Pour into a pan. [4] X Research source Use a pan that is roughly 13x9".

steps.title: Let the substance cool gradually for 30 minutes.
steps.content: Let the substance cool gradually for 30 minutes.

steps.title: Refrigerate for an additional hour, or until it becomes firm.
steps.content: Refrigerate for an additional hour, or until it becomes firm. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Finish up the recipe.
steps.content: Finish up the recipe. Cut the refrigerated gelatin into bite-size or finger foods you can serve to anyone in your household. [6] X Research source
